org.jclouds.aws.ec2

Interface AWSEC2Client

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.jclouds.ec2.EC2Api, org.jclouds.ec2.EC2Client

    public interface AWSEC2Client
extends org.jclouds.ec2.EC2Client
    Provides synchronous access to EC2 services.
    Author:
    Adrian Cole
